TopicTitle: Sierra Space Industries - Mining the Moons

Articles.Content:
Hello random people! Been hinting at this a little bit and now its finally a thing (again, technically). Few people have asked to follow my mining operations on the Mun, so back up comes my mission report site, complete with that as the first content. Gonna be hammering out a buncha content real quick this week so stay tuned, keep reading, and don't forget to come back here to discuss.

[**Check it out!**](sierraspaceindustries.weebly.com)

Current mission ribbons:

![EHcWZUf.png](http://i.imgur.com/EHcWZUf.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T22:17:07Z" title="06/10/2015 10:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by Captain Sierra**

Good news for people. I think I figured out an acceptable way to get all the trusses to the Mun in just 2-3 launches. I still have to figure out the exact layout I'm going for but once that's settled, stuff will be rolling onto the pad. Expect this post to get updated after new content is added.

-Sierra
